reviewText: Recently saw the band in Quebec city.  Great show.  This DVD is like a souvenir.  Sound quality is excellent.  the band is in top shape.
love the band too bad not bluray

I have all the DVD's and I can say that there is a renewed energy in the band.  Nick Barrett looks great and the audio and video are excellent. Check out the latest from one of the leaders of the 80's progressive movement.

Just received this a few days ago. Listened to the first two VERY long pieces and I must say, I was blown away. I like Pendragon but was not familiar with Masquerade. Man, this is essential latter day Prog. Nice movements, evolved endings, stellar guitar leads, excellent keyboard work.
